description.en: Your task is to follow the outer black line of your challenge and make two full rounds the fastest you can.

Start from any of the 4 squares.
You must stay on the outer line for the whole drive.
You have got 3 trials.

You needed 3 minutes+ to finish. = Good job! Let's try again.
You finished between 2-3 minutes. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You finished within 1 minute. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You needed 3 minutes+ to finish. = 5 points
You finished within 2-3 minutes. = 10 points
You finished within 1 minute. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
